_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

rule!AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit(
    originalObjects: ri!auditParams.originalObjects,
    newObjects: ri!auditParams.newObjects,
    objectTypeNumber: ri!auditParams.objectTypeNumber,
    namespace: ri!auditParams.namespace,
    username: ri!auditParams.username,
    auditConfig: ri!auditParams.auditConfig,
    externalAction:ri!auditParams.externalAction
  )

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

_a-0000ebc5-d78d-8000-9d55-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_mapExcelToUpdateClausesAttributes

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_constructFieldChangesDictionaryForManipulatedAudit
AS_GAM_ADT_UT_constructDynamicDictionaryForManipulatedAudit

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e8e5-7677-8000-9c1d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_CO_CPS_cancelSaveBackNextButtons
_a-0000e8e5-7677-8000-9c1d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  /*The button layout, which can dynamically be inside a section or not*/
  /*Note that when using this pattern of storing an interface as a local variable, it must be set to refreshAlways = true*/
  local!buttonLayout: a!refreshVariable(
    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"(
      primaryButtons: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          accessibilityText: ri!nextAccessibilityText,
          label: ri!nextLabel,
          size: ri!nextSize,
          saveInto: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!nextSaveInto),
            {},
            ri!nextSaveInto
          ),
          style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!nextStyle,
            replacementValue: "SOLID"
          ),
          validate: a!defaultValue(value: ri!nextValidate, default: true),
          validationGroup: ri!nextValidationGroup,
          disabled: ri!nextDisabled,
          confirmHeader: ri!nextHeader,
          confirmMessage: ri!nextMessage,
          showWhen: ri!nextShowWhen
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          accessibilityText: ri!confirmAccessibilityText,
          label: ri!confirmLabel,
          size: ri!confirmSize,
          saveInto: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!confirmSaveInto),
            {},
            ri!confirmSaveInto
          ),
          style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!confirmStyle,
            replacementValue: "SOLID"
          ),
          tooltip: ri!confirmTooltip,
          validate: a!defaultValue(value: ri!confirmValidate, default: true),
          validationGroup: ri!confirmValidationGroup,
          submit: ri!confirmSubmit,
          disabled: ri!confirmDisabled,
          confirmHeader: ri!confirmHeader,
          confirmMessage: ri!confirmMessage,
          showWhen: ri!confirmShowWhen
        )
      },
      secondaryButtons: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          accessibilityText: ri!backAccessibilityText,
          label: ri!backLabel,
          size: ri!backSize,
          saveInto: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!backSaveInto),
            {},
            ri!backSaveInto
          ),
          style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!backStyle,
            replacementValue: "LINK"
          ),
          validate: false,
          disabled: ri!backDisabled,
          confirmHeader: ri!backHeader,
          confirmMessage: ri!backMessage,
          showWhen: ri!backShowWhen
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          accessibilityText: ri!cancelAccessibilityText,
          label: ri!cancelLabel,
          size: ri!cancelSize,
          saveInto: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!cancelSaveInto),
            {},
            ri!cancelSaveInto
          ),
          style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!cancelStyle,
            replacementValue: "LINK"
          ),
          validate: false,
          submit: ri!cancelSubmit,
          disabled: ri!cancelDisabled,
          confirmHeader: ri!cancelHeader,
          confirmMessage: ri!cancelMessage,
          showWhen: ri!cancelShowWhen
        )
      },
      showWhen: ri!showWhen
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  /*Components to show*/
  if(
    ri!includeDivider,
    {
      /*Above divider section*/
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
        contents: {},
        divider: "ABOVE",
        showWhen: ri!divider <> "BELOW",
        marginBelow: "LESS",
        marginAbove: "LESS"
      ),
      /*Button Layout*/
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
        columns: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(contents: local!buttonLayout),
        marginBelow: "NONE"
      ),
      /*Below divider section*/
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
        contents: {},
        divider: "BELOW",
        showWhen: ri!divider = "BELOW"
      )
    },
    /*Button Layout*/
    local!buttonLayout
  )
)

{
  auditParams: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_P_AuditProcessParameters'(
    newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!newObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
      
    ),
    originalObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!originalObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
      
    ),
    objectTypeNumber: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
    namespace: rule!AS_CO_UT_getTypeNamespace(type: ri!objectType),
    objectDse: ri!objectDse,
    auditDse: ri!auditDse,
    username: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!username,
      replacementValue: loggedInUser()
    ),
    externalAction: ri!externalAction,
    auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
    auditType: ri!auditType,
    manipulationAudit: ri!manipulationAudit,
    complexFieldName: ri!complexFieldName
  )
}

  ),
  newObjects: rule!AS_GCM_BL_constructHelperForRefClauseAndClauseTexts(
    refClauses: ri!refClauses,
    refClauseTexts: ri!refClauseTexts
  ),
  objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_Clause_Helper',
  objectDse: null,
  auditDse: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_R_A_R_CLAUSE,

  username: ri!initiator,
  externalAction: ri!externalAction
).auditParams

_a-0000e86e-0144-8000-9c00-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_CO_CP_fileUploadField
_a-0000e86e-0144-8000-9c00-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!value),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: "No documents",
        style: "EMPHASIS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!value,
        expression: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: rule!AS_CO_UT_createDocumentDownloadLinkLabel(document(fv!item, "name")),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(document: fv!item)
          ),
          if(fv!isLast, null, char(10))
        }
      )
    ),
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibility
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fileUploadField_v1"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly
    ),
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    target: ri!target,
    fileNames: ri!fileNames,
    fileDescriptions: ri!fileDescriptions,
    maxSelections: ri!maxSelections,
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    required: ri!required,
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      array: {
        ri!validations,
        if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!allowedFileSize),
          null,
          rule!AS_CO_UT_fileSizeValidation(
            maxAllowedFileSizeInBytes: ri!allowedFileSize,
            fileSizesToCheck: fv!files.size
          )
        ),
        if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!allowedFileExtensions),
          null,
          if(
            contains(
              ri!allowedFileExtensions,
              fv!files.extension
            ),
            null,
            concat(
              "Files uploaded must be of the following type(s):" & " ",
              rule!AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence(
                list: ri!allowedFileExtensions,
                finalSeparator: "or"
              )
            )
          )
        )
      }
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    buttonStyle: ri!buttonStyle,
    buttonSize: ri!buttonSize,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibility
  )
)

_a-0000eae2-5167-8000-9ce4-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_returnCdtOrRecordIndicesByField
